title: Authors and Citation
text: Cameron D (2023). tdespec: Top decile expression specificity. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://dazcam.github.io/tdespec/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {tdespec: Top decile expression specificity},   author = {Darren Cameron},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://dazcam.github.io/tdespec/}, }

title: Top decile expression specificity
text: goal tdespec generate cell specificity scores scRNAseq dataset described Skene et al. (2018). utilises functionality Bioconductor package EWCE generate CTD object containing specificity scores cell type snRNAseq dataset generates files gene set enrichment analyses packages MAGMA LD Score regression.

title: Top decile expression specificity
text: can install development version tdespec like :

title: Top decile expression specificity
text: basic tdespec workflow 4-stage process: Create vector genes overlapping MHC region human genome. Obtain tibble gene reference file MHC overlapping genes removed. Create ctd object snRNAseq gene expression matrix. Create input files gene enrichment tests (MAGMA LDSR) save file.
code: library(tdespec) library(dplyr) #>  #> Attaching package: 'dplyr' #> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from 'package:base': #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union data("seurat_small") mhc_genes <- get_mhc_genes(build = 'hg19', method = 'rest_api') #>  #>  #> Connecting to Ensembl server via REST API... #> MHC genes detected: 382 #> MHC genes with unique HGNC ID detected: 374 gene_coord <- get_gene_coordinates(mhc_genes %>% pull(external_name)) #>  #>  #> Dowloading MAGMA hg19 reference file ... ctd_path <- create_ctd(seurat_small@assays$RNA@data,                         meta_lev_1 = seurat_small$cluster_level_1,                        meta_lev_2 = seurat_small$cluster_level_2,                        outdir = 'test/',                        mhc_genes = mhc_genes,                        group_name = 'brain_study') #>  #>  #> Creating CTD object ... #> MHC genes removed: 0 #> Loading required package: SeuratObject #> Loading required package: sp #>  #> Running CPM ... #>  #> Dropping uninformative genes cpm norm ... #> Check 21310Check 1452 #> 7 core(s) assigned as workers (1 reserved). #> Converting to sparse matrix. #> Checking for non-expressed genes. #> -2918 / 18392 non-expressed genes dropped #> Checking for cells with no expressed genes. #> DGE:: Limma... #> 8,495 / 18,392 genes dropped @ DGE adj_pval_thresh < 1e-05 #> Time difference of 8.103906 secs #>  #> Gene counts: #>  #> RAW:21310 #> RAW_NO_MHC:21310 #> CPM_DROP_GENES:9897 #>  #> Creating CTD object ... #> 7 core(s) assigned as workers (1 reserved). #> Converting to sparse matrix. #> + Calculating normalized mean expression. #> + Calculating normalized specificity. #> Converting to sparse matrix. #> Converting to sparse matrix. #> Loading required namespace: ggdendro #> + Saving results ==>  test//ctd_brain_study.rda create_enrich_test_files(ctd_path = ctd_path,                           study_id = 'brain_study',                          gene_coordinates = gene_coord,                          outdir = 'test/') #> Creating MAGMA input files for cluster level 1 ... #> Joining with `by = join_by(hgnc)` #> Creating SLDSR input files for cluster level: 1... #> Joining with `by = join_by(hgnc)` #> Level 1 checks ... #> # A tibble: 6 × 2 #>   Variable             Value         #>   <chr>                <chr>         #> 1 magma_upstream_ext   35000         #> 2 magma_downstream_ext 10000         #> 3 magma_window         35UP_10DOWN   #> 4 sldsr_upstream_ext   100000        #> 5 sldsr_downstream_ext 100000        #> 6 sldsr_window         100UP_100DOWN #> Output files have been saved to: test/. #> Done. #> Creating MAGMA input files for cluster level 2 ... #> Joining with `by = join_by(hgnc)`Creating SLDSR input files for cluster level: 2... #> Joining with `by = join_by(hgnc)`Level 2 checks ... #> # A tibble: 6 × 2 #>   Variable             Value         #>   <chr>                <chr>         #> 1 magma_upstream_ext   35000         #> 2 magma_downstream_ext 10000         #> 3 magma_window         35UP_10DOWN   #> 4 sldsr_upstream_ext   100000        #> 5 sldsr_downstream_ext 100000        #> 6 sldsr_window         100UP_100DOWN #> Output files have been saved to: test/. #> Done.

what: Create gene expression specificity scores for scRNAseq data — create_ctd
title: Create gene expression specificity scores for scRNAseq data — create_ctd
text: Create gene expression specificity scores scRNAseq data

title: Create gene expression specificity scores for scRNAseq data — create_ctd
code: create_ctd(   matrix = NULL,   meta_lev_1 = NULL,   meta_lev_2 = NULL,   outdir = NULL,   mhc_genes = NULL,   group_name = NULL,   threads = NULL )

title: Create gene expression specificity scores for scRNAseq data — create_ctd
text: matrix Raw count gene matrix - needs genes x cell annotation data meta_lev_1 vector cell IDs level 1 cell types meta_lev_2 vector cell IDs level 1 cell types outdir output directory store ctd object mhc_genes set MHC genes removed group_name string identifier dataset threads Number cores assign process. Default NULL, auto detect total cores estimate number use.

title: Create gene expression specificity scores for scRNAseq data — create_ctd
text: CTD object containing directory ctd object stored

title: Create gene expression specificity scores for scRNAseq data — create_ctd
code: data('seurat_small', 'mhc_genes') create_ctd(seurat_small@assays$RNA@data,                      meta_lev_1 = seurat_small$cluster_level_1,                      meta_lev_2 = seurat_small$cluster_level_2,                      outdir = 'test',                      mhc_genes = mhc_genes,                      group_name = 'brain_study',                      threads = 1) #>  #>  #> Creating CTD object ...  #> MHC genes removed: 0 #> Loading required package: SeuratObject #> Loading required package: sp #> The legacy packages maptools, rgdal, and rgeos, underpinning the sp package, #> which was just loaded, will retire in October 2023. #> Please refer to R-spatial evolution reports for details, especially #> https://r-spatial.org/r/2023/05/15/evolution4.html. #> It may be desirable to make the sf package available; #> package maintainers should consider adding sf to Suggests:. #> The sp package is now running under evolution status 2 #>      (status 2 uses the sf package in place of rgdal) #>  #> Running CPM ... #>  #> Dropping uninformative genes cpm norm ... #> Check 21310Check 1452 #> Warning: sctSpecies_origin not provided. Setting to 'mouse' by default. #> 1 core(s) assigned as workers (1 reserved). #> Converting to sparse matrix. #> Checking for non-expressed genes. #> -2918 / 18392 non-expressed genes dropped #> Checking for cells with no expressed genes. #> DGE:: Limma... #> 8,495 / 18,392 genes dropped @ DGE adj_pval_thresh < 1e-05 #> Time difference of 3.894935 secs #>  #> Gene counts: #>  #> RAW:21310 #> RAW_NO_MHC:21310 #> CPM_DROP_GENES:9897 #>  #> Creating CTD object ...  #>  #> 1 core(s) assigned as workers (1 reserved). #> Converting to sparse matrix. #> + Calculating normalized mean expression. #> Converting to sparse matrix. #> Converting to sparse matrix. #> + Calculating normalized specificity. #> Converting to sparse matrix. #> Converting to sparse matrix. #> Converting to sparse matrix. #> Converting to sparse matrix. #> Loading required namespace: ggdendro #> + Saving results ==>  test/ctd_brain_study.rda #> [1] "test/ctd_brain_study.rda"

code: create_enrich_test_files(   ctd_path = NULL,   study_id = NULL,   gene_coordinates = NULL,   levels = c(1, 2),   outdir = NULL,   sldsr_ext = c(100, 100),   magma_ext = c(35, 10) )

title: Create files for SLDSR and magma gene set enrichment tests from ctd object (Top 10%) — create_enrich_test_files
text: ctd_path string file path ctd object study_id unique identifier study gene_coordinates gene coordinate reference file levels vector levels outdir directory save enrichment test files . sldsr_ext vector upstream downstream gene / peak boundary extension window kb SLDSR magma_ext vector upstream downstream gene / peak boundary extension window kb SLDSR

title: Create files for SLDSR and magma gene set enrichment tests from ctd object (Top 10%) — create_enrich_test_files
text: Writes set tsv magma / SLDSR files directory interest

title: Create files for SLDSR and magma gene set enrichment tests from ctd object (Top 10%) — create_enrich_test_files
code: data(gene_coord) create_enrich_test_files(ctd_path = 'data/ctd_obj.rda',                                    study_id = 'brain_study',                                    gene_coordinates = gene_coord,                                    outdir = 'test/') #> Creating MAGMA input files for cluster level 1 ... #> Warning: cannot open compressed file 'data/ctd_obj.rda', probable reason 'No such file or directory' #> Error in readChar(con, 5L, useBytes = TRUE): cannot open the connection
